forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Change Desktop body height!

comments.text: Hi! In version 182.5 (you're on [version]), in desktop mode you can now press Alt+Arrow Down/ Up to lower your height!
For instance, this enables you to better move into seated position, or to film from a lower angle. Thanks Birby!
Also, Alt + Mousewheel zooming is now smoother when you picked Me -> Camera -> Very Smooth Movement.
And Update 182.6: We fixed a crash issue when increasing your height while on certain big grounds, like at Fazzi's Home!

thread.latestCommentText: And Update 182.6: We fixed a crash issue when increasing your height while on certain big grounds, like at Fazzi's Home!
